name: Hokuto no john 2: Party too hard
name_original: Hokuto no john 2: Party too hard
description:
Play with the arrow keys

John likes to party, but he had to keep himself under control, or his power could destroy the whole world. 

Team : 

programming and art : Hugo Malézieux / Isaak

Music and Sound Design : Abdoul-Jabar 'Yamakyu' Mayaki

Made in two days, during the Enjam (a game jam that took place in the ENJMIN video game school )
